name: Standard Delivery
describe: Delivery within Metropolitan cities of Dhaka, Chittagong, Sylhet, Khulna, Rajshahi within 24-72 HRSOn-demand Delivery within 4-6 HRS from point of pick-up to the customer (Dhaka Only)

name: Express Delivery
describe: Delivery within all cities of Bangladesh within 24-72 HRS On-demand Delivery within 24-48 HRS from point of pick-up to the customer (Bangladesh Only)

name: International Delivery
describe: Delivery within all capitals of Country wise within 12-72 days On-demand Delivery within 4-12 days from point of pick-up to the customer (Asian Countries only)

name: Cash on Delivery
describe: We provide the option of cash on delivery by collecting the payment in cash at the time of delivery

name: Door to Door
describe: We provide door to door (Home delivery) service packages with inventory management support, order processing, packaging, after sales support.

name: Reverse Logistics
describe: Reverse logistics is provided that allows customers to return their products
